name: 瞬
content: 一抹忧愁 红尘坠落
蓦然回首 梦已上锁
想和你 点燃这份热烈
We're gonna find a way up
We're gonna find a way up somehow
Even when it all falls down
Even when it all falls down
We're gonna find a way up
We're gonna find a way up somehow
Even when it all falls down
Even when it all falls down
We're gonna find a way up
Even when it all falls down
Even when it all falls down
